title: Kirsten Oswald – 2020 Comments on Tony Abbott
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kirsten Oswald, the Deputy SNP Leader at Westminster, on 4 September 2020.
content: If holding misogynistic, homophobic, Trump-backing, climate change-denying views, as well as saying that some elderly people with Covid-19 should be allowed to die, is what qualifies you for a role with this Tory government in promoting the UK internationally then it is not so much Global Britain as it is Little Britain.
